amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General to report to Congress analyzing the effects of this bill on lower income families, minorities and women.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to require the Comptroller General to report to Congress within one year of enactment on how the bill affects lower income families, minorities, and women.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
